headline: New & Noteworthy
abstract: A selection of recent audiobooks of note; plus, a peek at what our colleagues around the newsroom are reading.
lead_paragraph: THE PASSION ECONOMY: The New Rules for Thriving in the Twenty-First Century, by Adam Davidson, read by the author. (Random House Audio.) The creator of NPR’s “Planet Money” podcast argues that hope is not lost for the middle class, but the paths to success have changed.
keywords: The Passion Economy: The New Rules for Thriving in the Twenty-First Century (Book)
Start by Believing: Larry Nassar's Crimes, the Institutions that Enabled Him, and the Brave Women Who Stopped a Monster (Book)
The Republic for Which It Stands: The United States During Reconstruction and the Gilded Age, 1865-1896 (Book)
